content: create this knit cardigan with cherries or create the cherries separately and adorn your own sweater either way this fun pattern is a joy to make stitched in vibrant shades of red heart super saver you ll practice knit purl decreases increases plus making crochet cherries in single_crochet and crocheting in rounds tip use a cherry to cleverly cover any imperfections in your garment extending its life while adding a touch of whimsy if you re into 90s cottagecore aesthetics this pattern is perfect for you materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m sizes xs/s m l main color mc aran 0313 5 5 6 balls sizes xl 2/3xl 4/5xl main color mc aran 0313 6 7 7 balls contrast a cherry red 0319 1 ball or 45 yds/40 m contrast b tea leaf 0624 1 ball or 22 yds/20 m gauges 17 sts and 23 row = 4 10 cm in stocking st 14 single_crochet and 16 row = 4 10 cm with u s g/6 4 mm crochet hook measurements to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm
